description: React context provider component for managing canonical store state, including courses, assignments, and quizzes, with backend synchronization and real-time updates.

classes.name: CanonicalStoreContext
classes.description: React context object for sharing canonical store state and methods.

methods.name: CanonicalStoreProvider
methods.description: React component that provides the canonical store context, manages state, and handles backend synchronization.

methods.name: useCanonicalStore
methods.description: Custom hook to access the canonical store context within React components.
